docs.lead_paragraph: ANY report on methadone begins with heroin. It begins with the nation's heroin addicts -- roughly estimated at 200,000 to 250,000, perhaps half of them in New York City. It begins with the crimes the addicts commit, the fear they spread, the demoralization of neighborhoods and the erosion of cities to which they contribute.
